name: Design Tailwind Bootcamp Components into Inspect Element
description: Add tailwind and/or bootcamp components into Inspect Elements even if a webpage does not support tailwind. In the future, various components will be selectable.

content_security_policy.extension_pages: default-src 'self' https://cdn.tailwindcss.com https://www.google.com/; script-src 'self'; object-src 'self'; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'https://cdn.jsdelivr.net'; img-src 'self' https://camo.githubusercontent.com
